description.value:
All @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.MQixQwPAnbjydC5D.JournalEntryPage.fRctuS2C1P30zjAO]{abjuration spells} on all class lists are treated as being on the @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.vaLYevRxKe8mAvdE.JournalEntryPage.MNWLud81msaiZukw]{wizard spell list} for you, and you can choose them when picking wizard spells. You can use abjuration spell scrolls as if they are wizard spell scrolls.

This only applies to spells on one of the class spell lists. Eg. no wizard can choose @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.Item.u7aPgi0U1YedIg3K]{Divine Smite}, because it is a class feature and not on any spell list.
